channel.title: Education Incorporated Boutique School
channel.managingEditor: eduinc@solidgold.co.za (EduInc Private School | Solid Gold Podcasts)
channel.copyright: © EduInc Private School - all rights reserved
channel.description:
From Education Incorporated Boutique School (EduInc) in Fourways South Africa, comes a selection of productions from the language departments, as well as useful news, interviews, discussions, case studies and lesson outputs.

Produced by https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: An insight into how EduInc helps prepare its pupils for the world beyond school.
channel.itunes:author: EduInc Private School | Solid Gold Podcasts

item.title: NB! Very Important exam and year-end info | Headmaster Gershom Aitchison
item.itunes:title: NB! Very Important exam and year-end info | Headmaster Gershom Aitchison
item.itunes:subtitle: And some heads-ups for 2021
item.description:
NB! Very Important exam and year-end info — And some heads-ups for 2021 Headmaster Gershom Aitchison With 209 days of lock-down under the belt, and 6 weeks to go until our Honours Evening, this is a must-listen episode for all the details. Handy tip - grab a pen and paper!


Exam Schedule and other resources https://educationincorporated.co.za/resources.php

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Find out more about this leading school and how your child could benefit from its small classes and affordable private education. http://educationincorporated.co.za


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: Back to School! T3 2020 | Gershom and Jax Aitchison (Headmaster and Executive Head)
item.itunes:title: Back to School! T3 2020 | Gershom and Jax Aitchison (Headmaster and Executive Head)
item.itunes:subtitle: Slowly, slowly, we get back on Campus
item.description:
Back to School! T3 2020 — Slowly, slowly, we get back on Campus Gershom and Jax Aitchison (Headmaster and Executive Head) It's back to school time again. And as the world keeps changing in response to varying rules and levels Headmaster, Gershom Aitchison, and Executive Head, Jacqueline Aitchison, let all parents and pupils know what to expect.

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Find out more about this leading school and how your child could benefit from its small classes and affordable private education. http://educationincorporated.co.za

item.itunes:author: EduInc Private School | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Covid-19 Certainty, Agility, Flexibility and Dr. Taryn Gray | Dr. Taryn Gray | Paediatric Pulmonologist
item.itunes:title: Covid-19 Certainty, Agility, Flexibility and Dr. Taryn Gray | Dr. Taryn Gray | Paediatric Pulmonologist
item.itunes:subtitle: Private schools are not government schools
item.description:
Covid-19 Certainty, Agility, Flexibility and Dr. Taryn Gray — Private schools are not government schools Dr. Taryn Gray | Paediatric Pulmonologist Jax and Gershom Aitchison clarify when pupils are likely to return to our Fourways campus. They have a conversation with Dr Taryn Gray, a paediatric pulmonolgist, about the 'flu shot, co-morbidities and advice for parents. The new timetable for the 2nd half to the year is also discussed.


Dr. Taryn Gray, Paediatrician & Paediatric Pulmonologist https://chestandallergy.co.za/dr-taryn-gray-paediatric-pulmonologist/


Find out more about this leading school and how your child could benefit from its small classes and affordable private education. http://educationincorporated.co.za


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
item.content:encoded:
